entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 29 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
